data.text: Terrible things will also happen to Jerusalem,
The people there do not pay attention to people who tell them the wrong things that they are doing
Their leaders are like [MET] roaring lions;
The prophets in Jerusalem are proud,
But Yahweh is also in the city;
Yahweh says this:
So I thought to myself,
Therefore I, Yahweh, say,
When that happens, I will cause all people [MTY] to be changed
Then my people who were forced to go to other countries, those who live along the upper part of the Nile River in Ethiopia
At that time, you people in Jerusalem will no longer be ashamed about what has happened to you,
Those who are still alive in Israel will be poor and humble;
Those people who are still alive there in Israel will not do things that are wrong;
You people who live in Jerusalem [DOU] and other places in Israel,
because Yahweh will stop punishing [MTY] you,
At that time, other people will say to us people of Jerusalem,
because Yahweh your God is living among you.
Yahweh says, “You people were sad and ashamed
Truly, I will severely punish all those who ◄oppressed you/caused you to suffer►.
At that time, I will gather you together
